description.value:
Aura 10

An allied swordwing that drops to 0 hit points in the aura can make a melee basic attack as a free action.
Whenever the queen ends its turn, any dazing, stunning, or dominating effect on it ends.
The queen can score a critical hit on a roll of 19-20. While bloodied, it can score a critical hit on a roll of 17-20.
On an initiative count of 10 + its initiative check, the queen can use double attack as a free action. If it cannot make this attack due to any effect, then that effect ends instead.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Attack: Melee 4 (one creature)

+35 vs. AC

Hit: 2d12 + 25 damage, or 4d12 + 49 damage if the queen scores a critical hit.

At-Will

Standard

Effect: The queen uses armblade twice.

At-Will 1/round ✦ teleportation

Move

Effect: The queen teleports up to 5 squares.

Recharge 5-6

Minor

Effect: Ranged 10 (one allied swordwing); the target can charge or make a basic attack as a free action, gaining a +10 power bonus to damage rolls for the attack.

At-Will ✦ fear, psychic

Minor

Attack: Ranged 10 (one creature)

+33 vs. Will

Hit: 3d10 + 23 psychic damage, and the target falls prone.

At-Will ✦ teleportation

Triggered

Trigger: An enemy within 9 squares of the queen hits it with an attack.

Effect (Immediate Reaction): The queen teleports up to 5 squares and uses armblade against the triggering enemy.
